ta.title: තහනම් නියෝග සියල්ල ඉවත් කිරීමට එජාප කෘත්‍යාධිකාරී මණ්ඩලයෙන් තීරණයක්

en.title: UNP Working Committee a decision to remove all suspended orders
body_lines: The UNP Working Committee has decided to remove all the injunctions and delegated the party membership orders to the UNP membership with discontinued and measured by the party membership.
